text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 55. Should any bhikkhu try to frighten another bhikkhu, it is to be confessed.
๕๕. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใดหลอนภิกษุ เป็นปาจิตตีย์
55. Should any bhikkhu frighten a bhikkhu it entails expiation.
